contentrichtext.text: According to the [[Table of Nations]] in the [[Book of Genesis]] in the [[Hebrew Bible]] '''Gether''' (''Aather'' in [[Arabic language|Arabic]]) was the third son of [[Aram, son of Shem]]. In Arabic traditions, he became the father of [[Thamud]], whose brother the [[Qur'an]] calls [[Salih]]. In Josephus, he is ancestor of the [[Bactria]]ns, but [[Jerome]] (c. 390) and [[Isidore of Seville]] (c. 635) make him ancestor of the [[Acarnania]]ns or [[Caria]]ns. [[Category:Torah people]] {{Tanakh-stub}}
